channel.title: How to make npc hit harder
channel.description: Yeh, how do i make it hit harder, because i've added a corpeal best and i wanna know how to make him hit harder i tried to make his hp high but he doesn't hit higher. HELP PLEASE. :confused:

item.title: How to make npc hit harder
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

search this in npchandler.java:

// rat attack

the result should be something like this: } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 87) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x08A; // rat attack
now what that is, is the npc id (rat) and it’s attacking animation.
to make an npc hit u (I’m gonna use the rat for an example in this but u can use any npc u like) u need to have this code for starters and then:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 87) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x08A; // rat attack
|
|
|
v
add this under the existing code:

hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);

so you will end up with this:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 87) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x08A; // rat attack hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
this means that the rat while performing that emote, the system will calculate a random hit of the rat between 0 and 30 damage on you whilst in combat with it.
hope this helped u

—Note— this little snippet guide was made by me 100% so don’t say it was leeched

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npc hit harder
